redirects.comments:
This rule redirects any link from **xkcd** (a popular webcomic that often features science, math, and computer-related humor) to its corresponding page on **explain xkcd**.

Since many of the comics can be cryptic or highly technical, **explain xkcd** exists as a companion site where each comic is broken down and interpreted.

* **xkcd**: https://xkcd.com
* **explain xkcd**: https://explainxkcd.com
